panels.title: Failed logins by user (24h)
panels.query: index=main sourcetype=auth_logs | stats count(eval(result=="failure")) by user | sort -count | head 10

panels.title: Failed logins by src_ip (24h)
panels.query: index=main sourcetype=auth_logs | stats count(eval(result=="failure")) by src_ip | sort -count | head 10
